judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart and Drew, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The learned president judge of the court below has correctly stated the legal principles applicable to this case, and his opinion is accordingly adopted by us in affirming the order and decree.
The order and decree is affirmed at appellant’s costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: A. Archer Cross, with him J. Ambler Williams, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Van Syckel’s Trust.
Argued April 25, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart and Drew, JJ.
A. Archer Cross, with him J. Ambler Williams, for appellant.
June 29, 1935:
